lesson_plan: Create a 45 min lesson plan for the Learning objective selected for a grade
worksheet: Please create a worksheet for the learning objective. The worksheet needs to be printed on paper, and should help the teacher to identify the students who have not been able to understand the objective.
activities: Please Suggest youtube videos the Teacher can share in the class which can help her better teach class objective. The videos needs to be informative and relevant to the class objective.
slides: The teacher now wants to teach in form of Presentation. Please create a class presentation for her in a slide by slide format, which she can directly paste on the slides to present to the students. Please keep the text student facing. Please do not mention any instructions. Just the slide numbers and info to be present on the slide. Please keep the slides count to less than 10.
